mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dash_news_scrap (seq, newscomp, newstitle, newshref, registid) VALUES (dash_news_scrap_seq.nextval,#{comp},#{title},#{href},#{registid})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(REGISTDT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as REGISTDT FROM dash_news_scrap WHERE registid = #{registid} AND useyn = 'Y' GROUP BY REGISTDT order by registdt
SELECT seq, newscomp, newstitle, newshref, registid, TO_CHAR(REGISTDT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as REGISTDT FROM dash_news_scrap WHERE registid = #{registid} AND useyn = 'Y' order by registdt
